snippet: Antigua and Barbuda, a Caribbean nation of 81,000, has reached the World Cup qualifying semifinal round for the first time and will play the United States on Friday.
abstract: Antigua and Barbuda, a Caribbean nation of 81,000, has reached the World Cup qualifying semifinal round for the first time and will play the United States.
lead_paragraph: Antigua and Barbuda, a Caribbean nation of 81,000, has reached the World Cup qualifying semifinal round for the first time and will play the United States on Friday.

headline.seo: Antigua, Tiny U.S. Soccer Foe, Has Big Aspirations
headline.main: Antigua, Tiny U.S. Foe With Big Aspirations
